short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check if cast members are still alive and kicking ... just by clicking.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: To find out if cast members are dead or alive, visit a movie or show's page on IMDB and click the "Welfare Check" link in the Cast section.
